pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quasispecies Diversity // Set of utility functions for viral quasispecies analysis with NGS data. Most functions are equally useful for metagenomic studies. There are three main types: (1) data manipulation and explorationfunctions useful for converting reads to haplotypes and frequencies, repairing reads, intersecting strand haplotypes, and visualizing haplotype alignments. (2) diversity indicesfunctions to compute diversity and entropy, in which incidence, abundance, and functional indices are considered. (3) data simulationfunctions useful for generating random viral quasispecies data.
